Package com.example.lotteryapp

Class ProfileImage

java.lang.Object
com.example.lotteryapp.ProfileImage
public class ProfileImage extends Object
The ProfileImage class provides methods to generate and upload profile images. It allows the creation of arbitrary profile images based on a user's name or the upload of user-selected images to Firebase Storage.

The generated profile images display the first letter of the user's name on a randomly colored background. If no image is provided, a default image is generated.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • generateArbitraryPicture

      public android.graphics.Bitmap generateArbitraryPicture(String name)
      Generates a profile image represented by the first letter of the user's name on a randomly colored background.

      The image will have a size of 200x200 pixels, with the first letter of the name drawn in the center of the image. The background color is randomly generated.

      Parameters:
      name - The name used to create the profile image. The first letter of the name will be displayed on the image.
      Returns:
      A Bitmap object representing the generated profile image with the first letter of the name on a randomly colored background.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the provided name is null.
      See Also:
      • Bitmap
      • Canvas
      • Paint

    • generateRandomColor

      private int generateRandomColor()
      Helper method to generate a random RGB color. The color is generated by creating random values for red, green, and blue channels.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the randomly generated RGB color.
      See Also:
      • Color

    • uploadImageToFirebase

      public void uploadImageToFirebase(String entrantId, android.net.Uri imageUri, String name, ProfileImage.ProfileImageCallback callback)
      Uploads a profile image to Firebase Storage. If an image URI is provided, the image is uploaded directly; if no URI is provided, a default image is generated and uploaded.
      Parameters:
      entrantId - The ID of the entrant for whom the image is being uploaded.
      imageUri - The URI of the image to be uploaded. If null, a generated image will be uploaded.
      name - The name of the entrant, used to generate a default image if no image URI is provided.
      callback - A callback that will be invoked upon success or failure of the image upload.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the entrantId is null or empty.
      See Also:
      • FirebaseStorage
      • StorageReference
      • ProfileImage.ProfileImageCallback

    • uploadImageFromUri

      private void uploadImageFromUri(android.net.Uri imageUri, com.google.firebase.storage.StorageReference imageRef, ProfileImage.ProfileImageCallback callback)
      Uploads a user-selected image from a URI to Firebase Storage.
      Parameters:
      imageUri - The URI of the image to upload.
      imageRef - The Firebase Storage reference where the image will be uploaded.
      callback - A callback to handle success or failure of the upload.
      See Also:
      • FirebaseStorage
      • StorageReference
      • ProfileImage.ProfileImageCallback

    • uploadGeneratedImage

      private void uploadGeneratedImage(com.google.firebase.storage.StorageReference imageRef, android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap, ProfileImage.ProfileImageCallback callback)
      Uploads a generated Bitmap image to Firebase Storage.
      Parameters:
      imageRef - The Firebase Storage reference where the image will be uploaded.
      bitmap - The Bitmap image to be uploaded.
      callback - A callback to handle success or failure of the upload.
      See Also:
